md_berries_desc_1:
The more this Berry absorbs energy
from sunlight, the more vividly
colorful it grows.
md_berries_desc_2:
It takes longer to grow than Berries
such as Cheri. The smaller Berries
taste better.
md_berries_desc_3:
Nature's gifts came together as one in
this Berry. It has a wondrous mix of
flavors that spread in the mouth.
md_berries_desc_4:
One bite of this very tender Berry
fills the mouth with its sweet and
tangy flavor.
md_berries_desc_5:
This Berry is tremendously bitter.
Just one bite is enough to instantly
stop hiccups.
md_berries_desc_6:
If the leaves grow longer and curlier
than average, this Berry will have a
somewhat bitter taste.
md_berries_desc_7:
This bright red Berry is very spicy and
has a provocative flavor. It blooms
with delicate, pretty flowers.
md_berries_desc_8:
This Berry's thick skin and fruit are
very tough and dry-tasting. However,
every bit of it can be eaten.
md_berries_desc_9:
This Berry is oddly shaped, appearing
as if someone took a bite out of it. It
is packed full of spicy substances.
md_berries_desc_10:
This Berry drifted from a faraway
sea. It can now be cultivated even on
this island.
md_berries_desc_11:
This Berry progressively curves as it
grows. The curvier the Berry, the
sweeter it tastes.
md_berries_desc_12:
This Berry's gradual process of
storing nutrients beneficial to
Pokémon health causes it to mature
slowly.
md_berries_desc_13:
Sitrus came from the same family as
Oran. It is larger and smoother-
tasting than Oran.
md_berries_desc_14:
Though this small, delicately skinned
Berry is blue in color, it dyes the
mouth black when eaten.
md_berries_desc_15:
This Berry has a refreshing flavor
that strikes a good balance of
dryness and sourness. It tastes
better chilled.
md_berries_desc_16:
It is said that this Berry grew lumps to help
Pokémon grip it, allowing propagation
farther afield.
md_berries_desc_17:
This glossy and colorful Berry has a
mouthwateringly delicious
appearance. However, it is awfully
sour.
md_berries_desc_18:
Because of its hollow inside pocket,
there isn't a lot to eat. What can be
eaten is very sweet and delicious.
